'''Mr. Mugwort''' was a [[Bree-hobbits|hobbit]] of [[Bree]].

== History ==
During [[Frodo]]'s stay at [[The Prancing Pony]], he witnessed Frodo put on [[The One Ring]], and in the ensuing confusion he got into an argument with the innkeeper [[Barliman Butterbur]], not quite believing what he had just seen.<ref>{{FR|Sign}}</ref>
